text: Hamid Cheriet (in Kabyle language á¸¤amid Ceryat; 25 October 1949 - 2 May 2020), better known by his stage name Idir or Yidir, was an Algerian singer- songwriter and guitarist He was born in Beni Yenni, Algeria. His best known album was A Vava Inouva (1976). His best known single was "Pourquoi cette pluie?" (2002). Idir died on 2 May 2020 in Paris of pulmonary fibrosis at the age of 70. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from pulmonary fibrosis Category:Algerian singer-songwriters Category:Guitarists
title: Idir
